pages.text: It is not necessary to $(action)wait for your stamina bar to refill$() in order to attack an enemy.$(br2)While the cooldown element will still show beneath your crosshair, you $(bold)do not$() need to wait for it to refill in order to do the $(thing)full amount of damage$().
$(italic)Author's Note: This entry particularly baffles me because it seems to be written in plain language - in many ways, I understand it. And yet, I cannot fathom its meaning.$()
